ai-mil7.4.7:1.1_0: “After being sent away, what are the five factors that should be realized?”
ai-mil7.4.7:1.2_0: “Great king, all the moon in the Udaya,
ai-mil7.4.7:1.3_0: In the same way, a lay person who lives in the neighborhood of a village is committed to wakefulness. They guard the sense doors, eat in moderation, and are dedicated to wakefulness.
ai-mil7.4.7:1.4_0: This is the first kind of sand.
ai-mil7.4.7:2.1_0: Furthermore, the moon is extremely emaciated,
ai-mil7.4.7:2.2_0: In the same way, when you have misfortune, you should get desire and lust for continued existence.
ai-mil7.4.7:2.3_0: This is the second kind of sandalwood.
ai-mil7.4.7:3.1_0: Furthermore, a moon is the immority,
ai-mil7.4.7:3.2_0: In the same way, a great king, who lives in seclusion is secluded from continued existence.
ai-mil7.4.7:3.3_0: This is the third kind of sand.
ai-mil7.4.7:4.1_0: Furthermore, the moon is the immaculate,
ai-mil7.4.7:4.2_0: In the same way, a person who is ethical, of good character, contemplating in ethical conduct.
ai-mil7.4.7:4.3_0: This is the fourth kind of sandalwood.
ai-mil7.4.7:5.1_0: Furthermore, in a centural Ganges plain,
ai-mil7.4.7:5.2_0: In the same way, a cow comes to stay when someone has arrived at a village.
ai-mil7.4.7:5.3_0: This is the fifth kind of sandalwood.
ai-mil7.4.7:5.4_0: When the Buddha has spoken, great king. The gods are going for refuge, but the Buddha to the Videhan families about them, they’re like a fisherman’s mind. This being so, your mind inclines to remaining in the family.”
